Flow.description: Este process incluye todas la automatizaciones de oportunidades

value.stringValue: AND( OR([Opportunity].RecordType.DeveloperName ="Principal_Autos", [Opportunity].RecordType.DeveloperName= "Principal_Motos" ), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Cerrada ganada") , OR (CONTAINS([Opportunity].Marca_UDC__r.description1__c, "KIA") , CONTAINS([Opportunity].Marca_UDC__r.description1__c, "TOYOTA") , CONTAINS([Opportunity].Marca_UDC__r.description1__c, "HINO"), CONTAINS([Opportunity].Marca_UDC__r.description1__c, "SUZUKI") ) )
